abstract: Khairullozhon Matanov, friend of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, pleads guilty to lying to investigators.
lead_paragraph: A friend of one of the men accused in the Boston Marathon bombings pleaded guilty Tuesday in federal court to misleading investigators.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Bomb Suspect’s Friend Pleads Guilty to Lying to Investigators
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Bomb Suspect’s Friend Pleads Guilty to Lying to Investigators

snippet: A friend of one of the men accused in the Boston Marathon bombings pleaded guilty Tuesday in federal court to misleading investigators.
